name: [WIP] Dragons Can't Swim
description:
Level Design School Project made on UE4, supposed to be a quick level, that you can complete in 3 to 5 minutes.

All placeholder assets, except characters and music were made by me. I do plan or replacing them later. Textures are from Quixel.

Controls :

WASD : Move

Left Shift : Sprint

Space Bar : Jump and Glide
